description:
A Newscaster in Oedo TV. His name was paid homage to Kusano Hitoshi. He has a habit on calling http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Prince Hata] a stupid prince that berated him.
In Episode 29-B, Kusano interviewed http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Prince Hata] over the giant cockroaches infested in all of Oedo, particularly Kabuki-cho. Once Baka... Hata explained the infestation, he gave the stupid prince a camel clutch, or other submission moves.
name: Kusano Hitoyoshi
